sentences.sContent: She came trotting down the steps from the library.
sentences.sCn: 她从图书馆出来，小跑着下台阶。

synos.tran: （人）慢跑；马小跑的步态；小跑的马蹄声；刚学步的小孩；老太婆；腹泻；（学生作弊用的）译文对照本

words.tran: 猪脚；小跑步的马；快步走的人；当跑腿的人

trans.tranCn: (使)小跑, (使)快步走, 骑马小跑, 疾走
trans.tranOther: if a horse trots, it moves fairly quickly with each front leg moving at the same time as the opposite back leg
